name: TextBuilder
author: TextBuilder.ai

sections.description:
Our new plugin seamlessly integrates with the AI writer and content management tool, TextBuilder.ai, allowing you to easily post high-quality articles and top 10 best listicles directly to your blog.

With our plugin, you’ll have access to a wide range of article templates and customizable options, making it easy to create engaging and unique content that resonates with your audience. You can add images, choose categories, and even schedule your posts to go live at a specific time.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Release Date – 2024-03-03

  • Fix: Remove redundant js and css files

1.1.0

Release Date – 2024-03-02

  • Update: Added additional check for Apache web servers
  • Fix: Fixed main style file name

1.0.0

Release Date – 2023-04-08

  • Initial release
sections.reviews:
Powerful Content Creation Platform

By cfiresociety on June 10, 2023

TextBuilder is an incredible platform, it helps create amazing text for our websites - and the owner/founder is great with continually implementing improvements. Highly recommended.!

short_description: With the TextBuilder.ai WordPress Plugin, you can quickly create content and post it directly to your blog without any manual effort.
description:
Our new plugin seamlessly integrates with the AI writer and content management tool, TextBuilder.ai, allowing you to easily post high-quality articles and top 10 best listicles directly to your blog.

With our plugin, you’ll have access to a wide range of article templates and customizable options, making it easy to create engaging and unique content that resonates with your audience. You can add images, choose categories, and even schedule your posts to go live at a specific time.
